review: Works fine but you get more Chanels with a Roku
author: keith talaga

review: Fantastic!!! The remote and access to Prime content makes it a far superior product to Chromecast.
author: Scott C.

review: Absolutely love it!  Easy to set up and use.  The movie choices are vast and quality is outstanding!  My friends and family all want one now.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Doesn't work in our area for some reason.  Will try it again when we switch locations.
author: J. Brown

review: Amazing stuff. I love my fire stick. Goodbye cable!!!
author: Latif Kaid

review: Works great!!!  Easy to set up!!
author: JANET MILSTEAD

review: Greatest purchase ever! No more wasted money for satellite service!!
author: Angie Frye

review: Got this for a sale price. Did not pay $99. I love it!!! Only problem was that it didn't work on the TV at my vacation condo. Don't know why because it was an HD TV but maybe because that TV was not hooked to a network.
author: Hbb1967 "Retired reader"
